verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Come to the river that never will run dry.
Come to the river of an endless supply.
You will draw water from the wells of salvation.
Come to the river that never will run dry.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Ven al rio que nunca se secara.
Ven al rio de eterna provision.
Sacaras agua de la fuente de la salvacion.
Ven al rio que nunca se secara.
